item.title: krillinai /KrillinAI | Go | 4,031
item.description: A video translation and dubbing tool powered by LLMs, offering professional-grade translations and one-click full-process deployment. It can generate content optimized for platforms like YouTube，TikTok, and Shorts. 基于AI大模型的视频翻译和配音工具，专业级翻译，一键部署全流程，可以生成适配抖音，小红书，哔哩哔哩，视频号，TikTok，Youtube Shorts等形态的内容
